mapper.select: WITH CARTVIEW AS ( SELECT DISTINCT CART_MEMBER, CART_PROD FROM CART ), CARTPROD AS ( SELECT CART_MEMBER , PRODVIEW.* FROM CARTVIEW INNER JOIN PRODVIEW ON (CART_PROD = PROD_ID) ) SELECT MEM_ID , MEM_PASS , MEM_NAME , MEM_REGNO1 , MEM_REGNO2 , TO_CHAR(MEM_BIR, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MEM_BIR , MEM_ZIP , MEM_ADD1 , MEM_ADD2 , MEM_HOMETEL , MEM_COMTEL , MEM_HP , MEM_MAIL , MEM_JOB , MEM_LIKE , MEM_MEMORIAL , TO_CHAR(MEM_MEMORIALDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MEM_MEMORIALDAY , MEM_MILEAGE , MEM_DELETE , MEM_ROLE , PROD_ID, PROD_NAME, PROD_COST, PROD_PRICE, PROD_MILEAGE , LPROD_NM, BUYER_NAME, BUYER_ADD1, BUYER_CHARGER FROM MEMBER LEFT OUTER JOIN CARTPROD ON (MEM_ID = CART_MEMBER) WHERE MEM_ID = #{memId}
